Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Section 230 was added into the US annual defense bill in December 2020.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the impact of the addition of Section 230 to the defense bill, suggesting it immediately became law and would allow suing various companies.
Understate: No understatement bias is present in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim does not falter at times.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is contradicted by the official vote records and the absence of Section 230 in the 2021 NDAA.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Section 230 was added to the defense bill, which is a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: No alternative explanation bias is present in the claim.
